description: The file defines a React functional component named Navbar which renders a navigation bar. It manages user authentication state, displays different links based on user role and authentication status, and includes UI elements like notifications and logout functionality.

methods.name: Navbar()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the navigation bar with links, notifications, and user info.

methods.name: onLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout, then navigates to the login page.
